reviews.review: This game is and continues to be my go-to for World War II first person fighting. Excellent game.
CoD od Valve na silniku CS:GO
you can play as the good guys or the bad guys. which is which though
O Jogo é muito bom, boas armas e boa jogabilidade
Ein gutes Spiel, auch wenn ich leider miserabel bin. Leider gibt es nicht viele aktive server und auf den wenigen wird oft geschwäbelt.
if ur old grumpy grandad this game is for you
1939da adolf ile 1v1 attık kaybettim axis çok güçlü
This is a fun game with a good community. Small compared to other FPS games, but a few good servers with dedicated, friendly players keep this game fun and relevant even years after release.
Excelente jogo, recoil e bem  imersivo na segunda guerra
If you want to hear 40 year old men from New Zealand talking about their alcohol addiction and marriage problems in public servers, this is the game.
eis que seu amigo "pennis" tem 1 mil horas de joogo
muy piola el juego pero mejor esta tu hermana y tu prima
The community is boomers with complexes and all the maps are crappy.

Do you like source mods? (CS:GO, CS:S, TF2, Insurgency, etc) This is the best source mod there is. Its my contention that this engine is what made Steam kick off in the first place hence making Gabe Newell a billionaire a few times over. Its because of this game engine, and if you want to play a source mod Day of Defeat is your best option. Servers still going strong plenty of great maps  and content. And the servers full with tech competent 40 somethings who make creative experiences and not 10 year old kids like CS:GO PLAY IT NOW
I've spent lots of time on this game and it is fun. I could see myself sinking thousands more hours into this because it is that fun.
Too good, got banned by forty year olds.
Fun as hell, especially the servers with team kill.

Day of Defeat: Source vastly improves on its predecessor. It is practically the same game, yet superior in every way.
